snippet: Nanette Lepore, known for her youthful feminine fashions, sent embroidered caftans and colorful dresses with halter tops and cut-out backs down the runway on Sunday as a way to escape to warm, sunny places....

headline.print_headline: Nanette Lepore Offers a Dose of Escapism on Runway
headline.main: Nanette Lepore Offers a Dose of Escapism on Runway

lead_paragraph: Nanette Lepore, known for her youthful feminine fashions, sent embroidered caftans and colorful dresses with halter tops and cut-out backs down the runway on Sunday as a way to escape to warm, sunny places.
